trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref href="System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Error"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: ErrorEventArgs contains the <xref:System.Exception> that caused the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Error?displayProperty=fullName> event.
This class provides the <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A> method to retrieve the exception.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen innehåller den <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A>metod för att hämta undantaget.</xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.ErrorEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.IO.ErrorEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som motsvarar de fel som inträffade.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Exception> that represents the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref:System.Exception>som motsvarar de fel som inträffade.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Exception>som motsvarar de fel som inträffade.</xref:System.Exception>
